room_title: Escape room "Heist" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We did the Heist room. Really a very good storyline. Very complex. We had both experienced and non-experienced people in the room and everyone had an amazing time. Thanks guys!

room_title: Escape room "Heist" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Wow, so much fun! I had heard this place was different than other escape rooms and I am so glad I booked this place. So much more intellectual than many of the other rooms out there. It really makes you think! We had such a great time in Society, we booked Pathogen for the next day!

room_title: Escape room "Heist" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Escape This a very nice facility. The employees are very friendly and knowledgeable. They make sure you are set up for success! I did the Epicurean with friends and we had so much fun that we booked the Heist right away. Very immersive and fun!

room_title: Escape room "Heist" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We went a group of 8 for my bday. We have never done anything like this before but I'm so glad we did..thanks to groupon. We absolutely had a blast 8 people with different personalities and background having to work together as a team to solve the clues to finish in time. We did the Heist room. The staff was very accommodating and helpful. It a must do team building exercise. I would recommend it to anyone.

room_title: Escape room "Heist" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: My friends and I went for my birthday on a weekday. They're not actually open that day so we had the place to ourselves. We did the heist room which was SO much fun, every single one of my friends had a blast. A couple of them had been to a few other escape rooms but all admitted that this one was their favorite. The staff was super friendly during and post booking. Definitely recommend. I can't wait to go again!
